html.p: CVS (Concurrent Version System) is a Software Configuration Management (SCM) tool. It provides a repository for files and folders, and is capable of storing several different versions of files. SCM is very important when several people are developing a project at the same time, since it is possible to concurrently work on files and merge them into the repository. More information on CVS can be found at Cyclic Software.
